nop
now ~
ccc
now ~
nop
now ~
scc
now nzvc=1111
nop
now nzvc=1111

scc
clc
now nzvc=1110

scc
clv
now nzvc=1101

scc
clvc
now nzvc=1100

scc
clvc
now nzvc=1100

now nzvc=1011

now nzvc=1000

now nzvc=0111

now ~
